text: Chaetodon melapterus, the Arabian butterflyfish, blackfin butterflyfish, or black-finned melon butterflyfish, is a species of butterflyfish (family Chaetodontidae). It is found solely in the Persian Gulf, southern Arabian Peninsula (Gulf of Oman to Gulf of Aden), and southern Red Sea at depths of . [2016]: . Retrieved 2017-APR-27. ==References== melapterus
title: Chaetodon melapterus
